      • Property

        public Property(java.lang.String owner,
                java.lang.String address,
                java.lang.String eircode,
                double marketValue,
                java.lang.String locationCategory,
                boolean principalPrivateResidence)
        Constructor for objects of class Property
        Parameters:
        owner - The owner of the property
        address - The address of the property
        eircode - The eircode of the property
        marketValue - The market value of the property
        locationCategory - The location category e.g. city, small town, countryside
        principalPrivateResidence - Is the property the principal private residence of the owner? If yes then true, if no then false

      • taxDue

        public double taxDue()
        Calculates and returns the tax due on this property based on the fixed rate, market value, location, whether or not it is the principal private residence of the owner, and how many previous years are unpaid plus the penalty for a year remaining unpaid.
        Returns:
        The tax due on this property.
